job.title: Life Science Data Scientist / BioTech

be empowered to develop algorithms statistical methods and build out our bioinformatics infrastructurebrbrYoull be contributing to software systems data platforms and externally facing applications that empower this startups customers to gain insight into the systemic workings of the human biomebrbrstronguRequired Skills amp Experiencebrustrongul liPhD or equivalent in relevant disciplineli li
